title: Text Display Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Text Display plugin - displays custom scrolling or static text messages

enabled.description: Enable or disable the text display plugin

display_duration.description: How long to display the text in seconds (for non-scrolling or one complete scroll cycle)

live_priority.description: Enable live priority takeover when plugin has live content

high_performance_transitions.description: Use high-performance transitions (120 FPS) instead of standard (30 FPS)

update_interval.description: How often to refresh the text display in seconds

text.description: The text message to display on the LED matrix

font_path.description: Path to font file (TTF or BDF format). Relative to project root or absolute path.

scroll.description: Enable scrolling animation for text. If false, text is displayed statically.

scroll_speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per second. Higher values = faster scrolling.

scroll_gap_width.description: Gap width in pixels between scroll loops (space between end and start of text when looping)
